comments:
On CDT 2.0 M5 RC1.

1. Build a simple debuggable HelloWorld program using Cygwin.
2. Step through it.
3. Close session examine .metadata/.log file.
There are multiple pairs of ClassCastExceptions
and a IllegalStateException. See below.

The "ClassCastException" exception is the result of the bug 55442 which has 
been fixed.
We replaced the deprecated "shutdown" method of the "Plugin" class by "stop" 
and the "IllegalStateException" exception isn't thrown anymore.

traces.message: Workbench has not been created yet.
